channel.title: Return Of The Darkness Upick - Game Over - well that happened i guess
channel.description:
![image|617x500](upload://cqFZ2WTt4gDTWB82dhgKIKnvo1d.jpeg) Hosted and (will be) designed by @Icibalus Cohosted by @DatBird Reviewed by @osieorb18 @Geyde and @DatBird
## [u]`Rules`[/u] - Follow the [Global Forum/Discord/Game/Meta Rules - Please Read First ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244), and the [Official Forum Mafia and Forum of Lies Rules ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926). Please make sure you have enough time for this game before you sign up. - Alts will ***not*** be allowed in this game, and they are disallowed as a game mechanic. - Having fun is impossible. Do not attempt it. This rule will not be enforced, it is merely for your own safety. ## [u]`Gameplay`[/u] - Day phases will last 48 hours, or until curtailed by an execution. - The execution will be decided by means of Majority + Plurality. If a simple majority of all living players are voting for somebody, the day will end early and they will be executed. Otherwise, the player with the most votes will be executed at hte end of the day. - If at the end of the day the votes are tied, a random player among the tied votes will be executed. - Voting to execute nobody is a valid vote. If this vote reaches majority or has the plurality of votes, nobody will be executed. - Night phases will last 24 hours, however they may be shortened or extended slightly to keep EoD constant. - Days will begin and end at 18:00 PM BST unless otherwise stated. - The [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] will communicate via a discord server, which will be publicised at the end of the game unless a member of the [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] objects. - The [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] have an assigned factional kill, use of which is not compulsive. ## [u]`Setup`[/u] - **The setup, at this time, has not yet been designed**. - When you sign up, please *privately* send the host the name of a fictional character (i will give you leeway on this requirement if it's entertaining), and two other backup choices, in case you pick the same as somebody else. Please do not discuss these choices anywhere until the game begins. - Using those names, I will create the setup according to these parameters: - - 1 - Allignments will be randed independently of name choices. - - 2 - I will then construct a setup where all players have the randed allignment **and** abilities and rolename based on one of their character choices. I will attempt to use your first choice, but may use backup choices if the setup requires abilities incompatabile with your first choice's abilities. - - 3 - All players in the game will be either [color=green]**Town**[/color] or [color=red]**Mafia**[/color]. - - 4 - The game will not be bastard, however it may contain some elements on the boundary. If you're expecting a vanilla-like game, I honestly do not know why you're even considering joining a Upick. ## [u]`Example Rolecard`[/u] [details=""] # [color=green]**`Joycat`**[/color] ![image|225x225](upload://cGhm2OmJuBbcgXTXWcXFq7bEcPE.png) *:joy_crab: :joy_crab: :joy_crab: :joy_crab:* You are [color=green]**Joycat**[/color], a meme that is currently using Marshal as a phylactery to bypass its' proper death- as such, you are a [color=green]**Town Example**[/color] - **Impossible to Avoid (Passive) »** - Your rolecard will be publicly revealed at the beginning of the game. - **Indicative of Site Quality (Passive) »** - You are immune to death due to not being in the game. - **:joy_cat: (Night) »** - :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: :joy_cat: - Infinite uses. You win with the [color=green]**Town**[/color]. Eliminate all [color=red]**Mafia**[/color]. [/details] ## [u]`Signups`[/u] 1. Marluxion 2. Nightingale 3. an_gorta_pratai 4. Mistyx 5. [color=green]~~Jane~~ - Died N4 Trifalgar D. Water Law[/color] 6. [color=green]~~ZoneQ11~~ - Executed D4 W.D. Gaster[/color] 7. [color=red]~~WindwardAway~~ - Exceuted D1 Roy Mustang[/color] 8. [color=green]~~EliThePsycho~~ - Executed D2 Hat Kid[/color] 9. Chloe 10. [color=red]~~SirDerpsALot~~- Died N4 Yashiro Isana[/color] 11. Marshal 12. [color=green]Katze - Killed N3 - Korin[/color] 13. [color=red]~~min~~ ~~Centuries~~ PKR - Executed D3 - Miles Edgeworth[/color] 14. [color=green]~~ArcticXI~~ - Died N1 Society[/color] 15. [color=green]~~Apprentice YouButWorse ATNoName~~ Died N2 Glide[/color] 16. [s]TrustworthyLiberal[/s] Arete 17. ~~Silviu200530~~ Sulit ## [u]`Backups`[/u] - Whysper - Intensify - Ami - Wazza ## [u]`Spectators`[/u] - Astand - Alice - Amelia - EVO - Conduit - Cheeki - Pigeon - Appelsiini (Uninformed) - Geyde ### It is still night. Please do not post. ## [u]`Thread Marks`[/u] [SOD1- Arena](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/return-of-the-darkness-upick-d1-arena/87351/7?u=datbird) [Sulit Butters (Replaces) In](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/return-of-the-darkness-upick-d1-arena/87351/426?u=datbird) [YBW comes running (Replacing) in](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/return-of-the-darkness-upick-d2-augur/87351/1840?u=datbird) [Arete Trees (Replaces) in](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/return-of-the-darkness-upick-d2-augur/87351/2373?u=datbird) [EOD1- Windward AWAY!](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/return-of-the-darkness-upick-d2-augur/87351/3310?u=datbird) [Conroy Frenches (Replaces) In](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/return-of-the-darkness-upick-d2-augur/87351/3311?u=datbird) [SOD2- Augur](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/return-of-the-darkness-upick-d2-augur/87351/3314?u=datbird) [ATNoName takes the wheel (Replacing in)](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/return-of-the-darkness-upick-d2-augur-15-17/87351/4521?u=datbird) [PKR BLANKS in (Have u noticed like 90% of these threadmarks are just replacements. Me Neither)](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/return-of-the-darkness-upick-d2-augur-15-17/87351/5858?u=datbird) [EOD2- Eli is Executed](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/return-of-the-darkness-upick-d2-augur-15-17/87351/6730?u=datbird) [SOD3- ATNoName more like ATDead ](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/return-of-the-darkness-upick-d3-furnace-13-17/87351/6736?u=datbird) [url=https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/return-of-the-darkness-upick-d4-always-hated-crowds-11-17/87351/9238?u=icibalus]EoD3 - PKR GETS GOT[/url] [url=https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/return-of-the-darkness-upick-d4-always-hated-crowds-11-17/87351/9243?u=icibalus]SoD4 - Society Moves Past The Need For Katze[/url] [EOD4](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/return-of-the-darkness-upick-d5-flavour-text-is-a-thing-which-you-can-write-but-you-can-also-not-write-it-and-instead-just-post-nonseqitous-jokes-8-17/87351/10475?u=datbird) [SOD5](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/return-of-the-darkness-upick-d5-flavour-text-is-a-thing-which-you-can-write-but-you-can-also-not-write-it-and-instead-just-post-nonseqitous-jokes-8-17/87351/10479?u=datbird)

item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Marshal:

How did I get to be so cute?

I was born this way, bitch

Born This Way - YouTube

hi I put this in my spreadsheet of things I need to remember to remember for later (after the game ended)
mentioning that I should thank you for your acknowledgement of Gaga
thank you for your acknowledgement of Gaga

item.dc:creator: WindwardAway
item.description:
tbf I’m pretty sure Silviu didn’t know any better. He didn’t specifically ask me for anyone’s meta, only asked if he was allowed to ask me for meta help, so he probably assumed that by asking if it was ok, it wasn’t going to be considered “discussing the game outside of the game thread”. The problem is just that he asked me if it was ok and not a host lol.

Read full topic
